thread.section_title: Farm Fresh To You Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Farm Fresh To You | farmfreshtoyou.com
thread.title: bedford
thread.title_full: Farm Fresh To You reviewed by bedford

author: bedford
title: bedford
text:
This company decided it was a good idea to deliver a package and leave it on a public street on a busy road in central London, as you can imagine it wasn’t there in the morning.
Once I complained and confirmed this one off free sample wouldn’t be followed up with any future deliveries, I was accused of Fraud and charged the cost of the free box?
Just stick to Waitrose….
